NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IAppCastHandler
public interface
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IAppCastHandler
NetSparkleUpdater.​AppCastHandlers.​XMLAppCast

Interface used by objects that initiate a download process for an app cast, perform any needed signature verification on the app cast, and parse the app cast's items into a list of AppCastItem.  Implement this interface if you would like to use a custom parsing method for your app cast that isn't yet built into NetSparkle.

Functions
SetupAppCastHandler
void SetupAppCastHandler(
IAppCastDataDownloader dataDownloader,
string castUrl,
Configuration config,
ISignatureVerifier signatureVerifier,
ILogger logWriter = null
)

Setup the app cast handler info for downloading and parsing app cast information

Parameters
dataDownloader
IAppCastDataDownloader

downloader that will manage the app cast download (provided by SparkleUpdater via the SparkleUpdater.AppCastDataDownloader property.

castUrl
string

full URL to the app cast file

config
Configuration

configuration for handling update intervals/checks (user skipped versions, etc.)

signatureVerifier
ISignatureVerifier

Object to check signatures of app cast information

logWriter
ILogger

object that you can utilize to do any necessary logging

DownloadAndParse
bool DownloadAndParse()

Download the app cast file via the IAppCastDataDownloader object and parse the downloaded information.  If this function is successful, SparkleUpdater will call GetAvailableUpdates to get the AppCastItem information.  Note that you must handle your own exceptions if they occur. Otherwise, SparkleUpdater will act as though the appc ast failed to download.

Returns

true if downloading and parsing succeeded; false otherwise

GetAvailableUpdates
List<AppCastItem> GetAvailableUpdates()

Retrieve the available updates from the app cast.  This should be called after DownloadAndParse has successfully completed.

Returns

a list of AppCastItem updates. Can be empty if no updates are available.
